summary: The stories of several people are told as they stay at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth which features dining at "Separate Tables."
cast: Deborah Kerr|Rita Hayworth|David Niven|Wendy Hiller|Burt Lancaster|Gladys Cooper|Cathleen Nesbitt|Felix Aylmer|Rod Taylor|Audrey Dalton|May Hallatt|Priscilla Morgan|Hilda Plowright
keywords: reference to horace|reference to aristotle|snobbishness|dominant mother|seaside resort
title: Mesas separadas
